江八點.definition: Jiang Zemin's 江澤民|江泽民[Jiang1 Ze2min2] eight propositions on developing relations between the two sides of the Taiwan Straits, presented in a 1995 speech

江北.definition: Jiangbei, a district of Chongqing 重慶|重庆[Chong2qing4]; Chongqing's main airport; Jiangbei, a district of Ningbo City 寧波市|宁波市[Ning2bo1 Shi4], Zhejiang

江南.definition: south of Changjiang or Yangtze river; south of the lower reaches of Changjiang; often refers to south Jiangsu, south Anhui and north Zhejiang provinces; a province during Qing times; in literature, refers to the sunny south; Gangnam (district in Seoul, South Korea)

江南區.definition: Jiangnan District of Nanning city 南寧市|南宁市[Nan2 ning2 Shi4], Guangxi; Gangnam District, Seoul

江南水鄉.definition: patchwork of waterways, esp. in Jiangsu

江原道.definition: Gangwon Province of Korea during Joseon Dynasty; Kangwon province of North Korea; Gangwon province in northeast South Korea, capital Chuncheon 春川[Chun1 chuan1]
